title: IVIMfit: A Modular Python Library for IVIM Model Fitting and Visualization

creators.name: Işık, Atakan
creators.affiliation: Department of Biomedical Engineering, Başkent University, Türkiye

creators.name: Haberal, Orhan Erdem
creators.affiliation: Department of Biomedical Engineering, Başkent University, Türkiye

description: IVIMfit is an open-source Python library for model-based analysis of intravoxel incoherent motion (IVIM) in diffusion-weighted MRI. It supports monoexponential, biexponential (free and segmented), Bayesian, and triexponential model fitting.
